questions.question: What is the color of the sky?
hello
questions.answer: Hello, how can I help you?

questions.question: I need help of something
questions.answer: What something? Please be more specific so I can assist you.

questions.question: can you help me?
questions.answer: Sure, just tell me what kind of help

questions.question: how's your day?
questions.answer: As your personal healthcare companion. Thank you for asking about my day. As an artificial intelligence, I don't experience emotions or have personal experiences, so I don't have a 'day' in the same way humans do. However, I am always ready and available to assist you with any health-related concerns or provide information you may need. How can I assist you today?

questions.question: Good day, mate
questions.answer: Good day to you too! How can I assist you today?

questions.question: bye
questions.answer: Goodbye! If you have any more questions in the future, feel free to ask. Have a great day!

questions.question: Ow
questions.answer: I was alerted to the need for medical attention when you said, Ow

questions.question: owwwwwwwwww
questions.answer: I was alerted to the need for medical attention when you said, Ow

questions.question: OOWWWWWW
questions.answer: I was alerted to the need for medical attention when you said, Ow
